sentences.en: He could draw men round him and keep them bound to him; while his powerful attraction was there, disruption was out of the question.
sentences.cn: 他能够把人们吸引到他的周围而且保持他们的忠心；而他的强大吸引力所在之处，就不可能有分裂。

sentences.en: Shipping our television to the UK was out of the question—not only would it have been prohibitively expensive, it was unlikely to work here anyway.
sentences.cn: 把我们的电视运到英国是绝对不可能的，不仅仅因为高昂的运输费用，还因为在这里它根本不能工作。

sentences.en: a hike in the woods
sentences.cn: 林间远足

sentences.en: His dream is to hike the Appalachian Trail.
sentences.cn: 他的梦想是在阿巴拉契亚山道上徒步旅行。

phrases.cn: 走路；滚开；哪凉快那歇着去

sentences.en: But he cleared from any liability his close friend, interior deputy minister Rico Puno, saying he did not violate any law or rule.
sentences.cn: 但阿基诺三世免除了其密友、内政部副部长普诺(Rico Puno)的所有责任，称他没有违反任何法律法规。

sentences.en: Officials were still trying to determine the exact number of people intercepted by about 100 gunmen and taken to a remote mountainous area, said the interior secretary, Ronaldo Puno.
sentences.cn: 内政部长罗纳尔多·普诺（Ronaldo Puno）说，官员们仍在试图确定约100名持枪歹徒劫持并带到偏远山区的人质的确切数字。

sentences.en: the family tomb
sentences.cn: 家族坟墓

trans.tranCn: （迁入新居、更换工作后）安顿下来

sentences.en: I enjoyed school enormously once I'd settled in.
sentences.cn: 一旦适应了，我就非常喜欢上学了。
